useCase.name: Linking with Target System
useCase.description: User links the system with the target system

preconditions.precondition: System is active and connected to the internet

failureEndConditions.condition: Target system fails to accept connection

mainSequence.step: User links to the target system with a provided link
System activates the link and sends an offer message to the target system
Target system accepts the offer message successfully
System sends another offer message to the target system
System consumes the data transmitted by the target system
